products.name: NVIDIA - GeForce - RTX NVLINK BRIDGE for 3090 Cards - Space Gray
products.shortDescription: GeForce RTX NVLink Bridge 4-Slot version for when there are two empty slots between the cards, compatible with the RTX 3090 only.

products.name: PNY - GeForce GT1030 2GB PCI-E 3.0 Graphics Card - Black
products.shortDescription: Accelerate your entire PC experience with the fast, powerful NVIDIA GeForce GT 1030 graphics card. Its award-winning NVIDIA Pascal architecture, powerful graphics engine, and state-of-the-art technologies give you the performance upgrade you need to drive today’s most demanding PC applications. You can even get easy driver updates and one-click game optimization with GeForce Experience.

products.name: PNY - NVIDIA GeForce GT 710 VERTO 2GB DDR3 PCI Express 2.0 Graphics Card - Black
products.shortDescription: 2GB DDR3 memory; PCI Express 2.0 interface; DVI, D-Sub and HDMI outputs; 954MHz clock speed; 64-bit memory; GeForce Experience software; Nvidia CUDA technology; Nvidia PureVideo HD technology; Nvidia Fast Approximate Antialiasing Technology (FXAA)
